title: ‘A Very Good Result at 85 Percent’: Remco Evenepoel Sees Bright Side to Mixed Critérium du Dauphiné
content:
Belgian far behind race winner Roglič but finishes key pre-Tour de France event with smile on his face.

Read the full article at ‘A Very Good Result at 85 Percent’: Remco Evenepoel Sees Bright Side to Mixed Critérium du Dauphiné on Velo.
author: sstokes
